name: Cyadonia
description: Hundreds of clever block-sliding puzzles to challenge your mind! OBJECT OF THE GAME: Get the Cyad to the exit on each screen. It sounds simple...
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP2 or better Processor: Intel Celeron / Athlon Sempron or better Memory: 100 MB RAM Graphics: Open GL 2.0 compatible or better DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 25 MB available space Sound Card: N/A
